import React, { useState } from 'react' function ThirdMap(props) { const adding = () => { localStorage.getItem(props.localAns) ? parseInt(localStorage.getItem(props.localAns)) != 0 && (props.array.correct == 1 ? (props.setMarkCounter(props.markCounter + 1), localStorage.setItem( props.array.topic + 'cor', props.markCounter + 1, )) : props.setIncMarkCounter(props.incMarkCounter + 1), localStorage.setItem( props.array.topic + 'inc', props.incMarkCounter + 1, )) : props.ans.answeared && (props.array.correct == 1 ? (props.setMarkCounter(props.markCounter + 1), localStorage.setItem( props.array.topic + 'cor', props.markCounter + 1, )) : props.setIncMarkCounter(props.incMarkCounter + 1), localStorage.setItem( props.array.topic + 'inc', props.incMarkCounter + 1, )) props.ans.answeared = false localStorage.setItem(props.localAns, 0) } return (
adding()} > {props.array.value}
) } export default ThirdMap
